humanReadableSynopsis:
Repository for Bellan et al. (2015). The statistical power and validity of Ebola vaccine trials in Sierra Leone: A simulation study of trial design and analysis. Lancet Infectious Diseases.

This disease transmission model (DTM) can be run using the Universal Interface to Disease Simulators available here.
publicationsThatUsedRelease: Bellan SE, Pulliam J, Pearson C, Champredon D, Fox S, Skrip L, Galvani AP, Gambhir M, Lopman BA, Porco TC, Meyers LA, Dushoff J (2015) The statistical power and validity of Ebola vaccine trials in Sierra Leone: A simulation study of trial design and analysis. Lancet Infect Dis 15:703-10 (doi:10.1016/S1473-3099(15)70139-8)
title: Ebola transmission model
